roman.cwk.managedbeans

Class ProjectBean

  • java.lang.Object
    • roman.cwk.managedbeans.BaseBean
      • roman.cwk.managedbeans.ProjectBean

  • public class ProjectBean
extends BaseBean
    Controller, managed bean for project ideas. Adds error messages to the view if necessary.

        Prepare show project detail page.
        Parameters:
        id - id of project idea which detail is to be shown
        Returns:
        String that redirects to the detail page, or empty string if the page can not be prepared.

        Deletes project idea.
        Parameters:
        projectId - id of idea that is to be deleted.
        Returns:

        Prepares edit project idea page.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
